title: Elite Gourmet EAF0852SS 8.5Qt. Capacity Air Fryer Oven, Air Fry, Broil, Toast, Bake & Broil with Convection, Time and Temperature Controls, 800-Watts, Includes 25 Delicious Recipes, Stainless Steel
description: The Elite Gourmet 8.5 Quart Air Fryer Oven has a variety of functions to give the chef in your home unlimited cooking potential. Designed with a beautiful stainless-steel finish, adjustable Timer and Temperature controls, and 5 functions so you can air fry, broil, bake, roast, toast, broil with convection, warm and reheat your favorite meals and snacks fast & easy! Enjoy moist & tasty treats or crispy healthy fried foods without oil and fewer calories! It’s faster than conventional cooking methods, doesn’t heat up your entire kitchen and it’s easy to clean. There’s no need to cook with added fats or oils & saves time and energy. Unlike hot oil deep fryers, Elite Gourmet's Air Fryer Oven circulates dynamic-hot air 360° enveloping foods for a crispy outer and tasty, juicy & tender inner without oil and it’s easier on your electric bill than conventional ovens. Includes a bake pan, air fry basket, removable crumb tray and an instruction manual with cooking guide and 25 delicious and healthy recipes.
